body.content:
Dear Sir,



Thanks for your mail.

I would like to invest in your country if you will support me because I
have no knowledge about business.



I inherited this money from my late father and have decided to move from
here due to political crises that lead to ethnic killings and property
destruction.



What I need from you is a sincere promise that you will not betray or deny
me when you get the money in your custody as I will relocate to meet you
for the investment project in your country so I can start a new life.



I am waiting for your early reply so I can tell you more.


With best regards,
Maryann
